## IEngine.Stop() method

Stops the engine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
Stop(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

Promise that resolves once the engine has stopped.

## Remarks

It is possible to reuse the engine by calling [IEngine.Start()](./yoha.iengine.start.md)<!-- -->.
